Models¶

class search_img.models.SearchResult(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Model for storing the search results.

Attributes:
tag: Tag id. image_url: Image link. site: A site that has found the image. date: Search date. rank: Rank image by relevance. objects: Instance of class SearchResultManager.
class search_img.models.SearchResultManager[source]¶

This is the interface through which database query operations are provided to models.

get_list(name)[source]¶

Get list of search results.

Args:
name: Tag name.
Returns:
The result of filter() on a given model manager cast to a list, raising Http404 if the resulting list is empty.
get_results(name)[source]¶

Get list of search results.

Args:
name: Tag name.
Returns:
The list of search results sorted by rank.
class search_img.models.Tag(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Model for storing the tag names and status.

Attributes:
name: Tag name. status_google: The status of Google parsing. status_yandex: The status of Yandex parsing. status_instagram: The status of Instagram parsing. objects: Instance of class TagManager.
class search_img.models.TagManager[source]¶

This is the interface through which database query operations are provided to models.

get_or_create_tag(name)[source]¶

If tag is no in the database, add it.

Args:
name: Tag name.
Returns:
The tag by name if the tag does not exist raises Http404 exception.
get_tag(name)[source]¶

Returns the tag by name.

Args:
name: Tag name.
Returns:
The tag by name if the tag does not exist raises Http404 exception.
